trans_title: 地球上的部落 第一季
introduction: The series will take you through the four tribes in Kenya unknown to the general public, including the Pokot, El Molo, the Turkana, and the Rendille tribe.1. Pokot - Children of the NileOur first stop will be at Bogoria where we will live with the Pokot tribe, a society marked by the so-called "age groups".
